dcterms:description: Pancreas CT dataset is a public dataset containing 80 scans with a resolution of 512×512 pixels and slice thickness between 1.5 and 2.5 mm. Each image has a corresponding pixel-wise label, which is annotated by an expert and verified by a radiologist.
dcterms:title: Pancreas CT dataset

dcterms:creator: A. L. Simpson

G. Litjens
B. Menze
dcterms:description: Colon cancer dataset is a subset from Medical Segmentation Decathlon (MSD) datasets, consisting of 190 colon cancer CT volumes. Pixel-level label annotations are given on 126 CT volumes.
dcterms:title: Colon cancer segmentation dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Yu
S. Wang
X. Li
C.-W. Fu
P.-A. Heng
dcterms:description: LA dataset contains 100 MR image scans with an isotropic resolution of 0.625 × 0.625 × 0.625mm3. This dataset is fully annotated with pixel-level supervision.
dcterms:title: The Left Atrium (LA) MR dataset
